name: SEEN - A Sign Language Translation App
Miniature Collection Manager
description: Designed a CRUD application to gain further practice with database interaction, and data display. Designed to store formatted data about a miniature wargaming collection, Miniature Collection Manager allowed for the rapid itemization of a large inventory of game pieces for the wargaming hobby. Past the core concept, I was able to gain immense familiarity with how React works, as well as experience with building an application that used the component library MUI.

name: Five Crowns In The Command Line
description: Built out a simplified version of the card game "Five Crowns" in Rust, using Ascii art as a visual. Lots of work around data structures and other concepts in programming went into making a system which ran quickly and stored information in an extremely useful format.

name: Project InvenStory - System Proposal & System Specification
